blockquotes.quote: Highly skilled, personable, helpful and dedicated: David exceeded my expectations to deliver for us on a key project.
blockquotes.cite: Frank Fenton – Head of Digital – Dinosaur UK Ltd.

blockquotes.quote: David honestly was the integral component that allowed us to finally launch. We continue to go to him for any development work for our site, because he goes above & beyond what you’d ever expect.
David provided us with beautiful and cost effective templates for our CMS that surpassed our high expectations from both the design and the tech perspective.
blockquotes.cite: Kevin Mueller – Studio Manager – Uwe Wittwer
